lead_paragraph: SHEVELL--Jon. In loving memory of Jon L. Shevell who passed eight years ago on March 3rd. We miss the unconditional love and laughter you gave to us every day. We know Arlene (Mommy), Uncle Danny, Aunt Janice and your grandparents are with you today. With all our love and kisses, Dad, Nancy, Paul, Susan, Robert, Merissa, Zachary and Arlen. 1/3
